'''Paul Mercier''' is an American voice actor.

==Roles==
* [[2009]]: ''[[The Lord of the Rings: Conquest]]'': [[Faramir]], Evil Human Officer 3, Gondorian Officer 3
* [[2006]]: ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Battle for Middle-earth II]]'': Additional voices
* [[2004]]: ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Battle for Middle-earth]]'': Additional voices
* [[2004]]: ''[[The Lord of the Rings: War of the Ring]]'': Additional voices
